resources.string:
Density: %1$3.2f pix/in
 Density: %2$d Dpi: %3$s
 %4$3.1f/%5$3.1f pix/inch
 *wxh(pix): %6$dx%7$d
 *wxh(dpi): %8$dx%9$d
 device: %10$s-%11$s
 * wxh is width/height

<html>
          <!-- html_body -->
          <head>
            <style>
                img { border: 3px solid gray; }
                body {
                    font-size:%1$s;
                    font-family: Arial;
                    background-color:%2$s;
                    color:%3$s;
                }
                table { border-color: gray; }
            </style>
          </head>
          <body>
              <!-- Main body -->
              %4$s
          </body>
        </html>
